Lights™ is a 5-reel, 3-row, 9-bet line video slot. The game features Floating Wild and Free Spins.

Lights Touch™ Game Rules

In the event of malfunction of the gaming hardware/software, all affected game bets and payouts are rendered void and all affected bets refunded.
MAX BET plays the game at the maximum bet lines, highest bet level, and the current coin value.
MAX BET plays the game at the highest bet level and the current coin value. When playing at any lower bet level, MAX BET must be clicked twice to play the round with the selected coin value.

When playing at the highest bet level, MAX BET plays the game at the maximum bet lines and the current coin value. When playing at any lower bet level, MAX BET must be clicked twice to play the round at the selected level.

When playing at the highest bet level, MAX BET plays the game at the maximum bet lines and the current coin value. When playing at any lower bet level, MAX BET must be clicked twice to play the round at the selected level.
When playing at the highest bet level, MAX BET plays the game at the current coin value. When playing at any lower bet level, MAX BET must be clicked twice to play the round at the selected level.

When playing at the highest bet level, MAX BET plays the game at the maximum bet lines and the current coin value. When playing at any lower bet level, MAX BET must be clicked twice to play the round at the selected level.

When playing at the highest bet level, MAX STAKE plays the game at the maximum bet lines, and the current coin value. When playing at any lower bet level, MAX STAKE must be clicked twice to play the round at the selected level.

When playing at the highest bet level, MAX BET plays the game at the maximum win matches and the current coin value. When playing at any lower bet level, MAX BET must be clicked twice to play the round at the selected level.

A Wild symbol can be part of several different Wild Monkey patterns if they overlap.
It is randomly decided in what direction the patterns are laid out on the reels, but the entire patterns are always visible, making all Wild symbols included in the reel area.
Go Bananas!™ is a 5-reel, 3-row, 20-bet line video slot. The game features 5 different Wild Monkeys that activate Wild symbols.
Go Bananas!™ Game Rules
Go Bananas! Touch™ Game Rules

Floating Wild
3 or more Scatter symbols still activate Free Spins and Floating Wilds still substitute for all symbols except Scatter symbols.
Between 3 and 6 Floating Wilds appear randomly in every spin in Free Spins.
Between 2 and 4 Floating Wilds appear randomly in every spin.

Wild Gorilla

Wild Langur.
